name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 19
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Aurelia Update with Decorators, IE9 and More
posts.description: Today's release finally brings full ES7 and TypeScript decorators, IE9 support and a new, simplified HTML Behavior programming model. We've also made a few performance enhancements along the way.

posts.name: Aurelia's Adaptive Binding
posts.description: This week, Core Team Member, Jeremy Danyow [https://github.com/jdanyow], shares with us how Aurelia's adaptive and extensible binding system works its magic.

posts.name: Aurelia 0.10.0 Release & Status
posts.description: Today, we've got a major set of release for Aurelia, fixing many issues and adding new and more powerful features to the lineup.

posts.name: Aurelia & Angular 2.0 Code Side by Side - Part 2
posts.description: Yesterday I showed an example of Angular 2.0 code side-by-side with Aurelia [http://blog.durandal.io/2015/03/16/aurelia-and-angular-2-code-side-by-side/]. I showed the "reverse binding" technique for Angular 2.0. Today I'm going to show how the Angular 2.0 Forms Model [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1US9h0ORqBltl71TlEU6s76ix8SUnOLE2jabHVg9xxEA/] can be used instead. I'll also show Aurelia next to it, so you can see the difference. Both examples will use the same Contact model.

posts.name: Aurelia & Angular 2.0 Code Side by Side
posts.description: Showing the same code for the same tasks, side-by-side in Aurelia and Angular 2.0.

posts.name: Aurelia - Status - March 2015
posts.description: Little over a month ago, we announced the public preview of Aurelia [http://aurelia.io/]. Since then the community has exploded and we've seen a lot of exciting things happen. Thanks to the core team and an engaged community, we've made some big improvements. We've still got a way to go yet, but the future looks great. Below we'll update you on what's happened in the last month as well as let you know what to expect next.

posts.name: Binding with Value Converters in Aurelia
posts.description: This week, Core Aurelia Team member focusing on binding, Jeremy Danyow, shows us how to leverage value converters in Aurelia.
